text: That should help lightening the mood!
We're so happy here, simply jamming together
Hmm... Maybe we can cheer them up somehow?
You're never fully dressed without a smile!

They seem overwhelmed... 
Let's help packing up the trophies!
At least we brought them a bit of relief
Nothing like a little music to feel better
Music can be a great way to start the day
Oh, I forgot that was here!
No trophy can bring me as much pride as you all do
Looks like the trophies should be packed here

Dun, dun, dun... 
Another one bites the dust!
Guess that makes me dust in the wind
You can probably clean the living room dust with that
I... can't see anything, it's too dirty
